p: On the basis of susceptibility testing results, the minimum inhibitory concentrations (MICs) did not differ significantly with regard to tested fungal strains: the mean MIC value obtained for TTO was 0.12% ( v/ v) (corresponding to 1.08 mg/mL), while for ITZ and KTZ as reference drugs was 0.5 µg/mL and 0.25 µg/mL, respectively. On the basis of minimum fungicidal concentration (MFC) results, TTO was found to display a fungicide activity against T. rubrum isolates ( Table 2).
